summary: The usual gang of robbers in engaged by a thief from Milan to steal a suitcase full of money, but troubles will menace the success of the operation.
cast: Vittorio Gassman|Renato Salvatori|Claudia Cardinale|Vicky Ludovici|Riccardo Garrone|Tiberio Murgia|Carlo Pisacane|Gianni Bonagura|Gina Amendola|Clara Bindi|Elena Fabrizi|Mario Feliciani|Mauro Lemma|Gastone Moschin|Elvira Tonelli|Toni Ucci|Nino Manfredi|Tullio Altamura|Gianni Baghino|Mirko Baiocchi|Ciccio Barbi|Any Cerreto|Renato Cominetti|Iolanda Fortini|Nanni Loy|Vittorio Mezzogiorno|Nino Musco|Renzo Pevarello|Amerigo Santarelli|Guglielmo Spoletini
